Instruction: Peel the bananas and slice them lengthwise.
In a small bowl, mix honey and cinnamon.
Brush the banana slices with the honey-cinnamon mixture on both sides.
Place the banana slices directly on the grill grates.
Grill for 2-3 minutes per side, or until grill marks appear and bananas are heated through.
Remove from grill and serve warm.
